content: Any opinions on what our twitter avatar should be? It used to be the Z-in-a-circle currently in the upper left of the app, and I just replaced it with octopus-holding-a-Z as a trial. I feel like neither are amazing, so other ideas would be great. https://twitter.com/zuliposs
I like the current one better :) :octopus:
I think our Twitter avatar should be whatever our main logo is, which means right now it'd be the black Z in a green circle. Or it could be a group photo of us.
The octopus-holding-a-Z looks like what you'd see in Atlas Shrugged, if this is intentional.
